description: This file defines a singleton object ServiceLocator which provides mock implementations of various repositories for use in a mock-only mode of an Android application. It includes methods to retrieve repositories and logs the mock mode activation.

methods.name: contentRepository
methods.description: Returns a mock ContentRepository instance and logs mock mode activation.

methods.name: metadataRepository
methods.description: Returns a mock MetadataRepository instance, given a Context, and logs mock mode activation.

methods.name: assetsRepository
methods.description: Returns a mock AssetsRepository instance and logs mock mode activation.

methods.name: ratingRepository
methods.description: Returns a mock RatingRepository instance and logs mock mode activation.

methods.name: useMocks
methods.description: Indicates whether the mock mode is active; always returns true in this context.
